meanings.definition: To design or make in a particular style.
meanings.sent1: She stylises her drawings with bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The artist stylises her paintings with bold brush strokes.
meanings.sent3: He stylises his room with a mix of vintage and modern furniture.
meanings.sent4: The chef stylises the dish presentation like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer stylises the runway with avant-garde designs.

meanings.definition: To represent in a particular style.
meanings.sent1: The director stylises the movie with unique camera angles.
meanings.sent2: The photographer stylises the portrait with creative lighting.
meanings.sent3: The comedian stylises his jokes with witty punchlines.
meanings.sent4: The writer stylises the story with vivid descriptions.
meanings.sent5: The musician stylises the song with a catchy melody.
